document_data.name: ''Whirling Scimitar''
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite dragon/244/Bazaar of the Bizarre: Miracles of Flight}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''''whirling scimitar''''' was a [[Zakhara]]n [[magic]]al weapon that could bestow the ability to fly.
document_data.Description: This item usually appeared as a [[scimitar]], but versions in the form of a [[broadsword]] or [[two-handed sword]] also existed. It was most common in the lands of Zakhara but could be found elsewhere, too.
document_data.Powers: Used in a fight, the ''whirling scimitar'' showed a stronger magical attack potential against flying creatures than against others and a still stronger one against those from the [[Elemental Plane of Air]]. When whirled above the head of the wielder instead of attacking, it bestowed the ability of a ''[[fly]]'' spell. The ability to fly stopped immediately if the wielder lost hold of the weapon.
